entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Webequie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:37 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lansdowne House Airport 08:00 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.7°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: SSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning then becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:42 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 20 after midnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:42 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Friday: Periods of freezing rain or snow. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing rain or ice pellets in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon except a few showers over southern sections. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming north 20 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:42 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016
